info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 03 at 2:41AM CST until February 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Sleet and snow accumulations up to one inch across the warning area and ice accumulations of one quarter of an inch across northeast Texas and southwestern Arkansas with near one half of an inch across southeast Oklahoma. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Oklahoma, southwest Arkansas and northeast Texas. * WHEN...Through 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
